root.TaylorSwift: <1> Approximately, how many months are generally between Taylor Swift albums? 22 24 23 25 24 </1> <2> What movie, originally a Disney show, did Taylor Swift make a cameo and Perform? Hannah Montana Wizards of Waverly Place Good Luck Charlie The Suite Life Hannah Montana </2> <3> What network had Taylor Swift’s Journey to Fearless special first appear on? Teennick Cartoon Network Discovery Kids The Hub The Hub </3> <4> What year did Taylor Swift’s Christmas Album come out in? 2008 2006 2007 2009 2007 </4> <5> Who did Taylor Swift do a CMT Crossroads special with? Def Leppard Lynyrd Skynard The Rolling Stones Whitesnake Def Leppard </5> <6> Which Taylor Swift album won a Grammy for an album of the year? Taylor Swift Fearless Speak Now Red Fearless </6> <7> What year did Taylor Swift win a People’s Choice Award for female artist? 2010 2012 2011 2009 2010 </7> <8> What consecutive years did Taylor Swift win a People’s Choice award for country artist? 2012-2013 2009-2010 2011-2012 2008-2009 2011-2012 </8> <9> Which song, from the Red album, got the highest RIAA certification? Everything Has Changed I Knew You Were Trouble 22 Red I Knew You Were Trouble </9> <10> Which Taylor Swift song, from the Fearless album, did the best on the charts? Fifteen White Horse You Belong With Me Love Story Love Story </10>
